summary: The module implements a system for transferring exception information across process or environment boundaries. It defines a metaclass that customizes how exception types are created, ensuring proper initialization and string representation when reconstructed remotely. It also provides a generic fallback exception class for cases where the original serverâ€‘side exception type is unavailable on the client.
business_intent: To preserve and convey detailed error information from remote code execution back to the originating workflow, enabling accurate debugging and consistent error handling in distributed or sandboxed environments.
